name: The Story of Frog - A Froguelike Adventure
name_original: The Story of Frog - A Froguelike Adventure
description:
Tell the story of your adventures by reliving them chapter by chapter. What places did you explore? What snacks did you eat on the way? .. and how? Did you meet any friend? Did you wear your best hat?

You choose how to tell this story and hopefully you can make it to the end by fending off flies and butterflies and avoiding carnivorous plants.. or just eating them all, you can't stop yourself from getting a snack anyway! 

As you go you will get more skillful with your tongue, quicker, stronger and there will be no stopping you when you learn all of the mysterious ways of eating as many bugs as quick as possible.

A game made for the Halloween Game Jam 2022 hosted by Spelkollektivet.

Theme: Chapter/chapters

Team:

Johanna - art, sound, game design

Remi - programming, game design
